content_html:
Kathmandu, September 15

Newly appointed minister Om Prakash Aryal has been given charge of two ministries.

Aryal, who took the oath of office from President Ramchandra Paudel on Monday, will lead the Ministry of Home Affairs and the Ministry of Law, Justice and Parliamentary Affairs.

Alongside Aryal, Kulman Ghising and Rameshwor Khanal were also sworn in. Ghising has been assigned the Ministry of Energy, Physical Infrastructure and Urban Development, while Khanal has been given the Finance Ministry.

The post Aryal assigned 2 ministries appeared first on OnlineKhabar English News.

Alongside Aryal, Kulman Ghising and Rameshwor Khanal were also sworn in. Ghising has been assigned the Ministry of Energy, Physical Infrastructure and Urban Development, while Khanal has been given the Finance Ministry.
